001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.client.error.ConcurrentModificationException;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.LongNode;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
015
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.InternalLogger;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonException;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
020
021import org.slf4j.Logger;
022import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
023
024import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
025import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
026import dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy;
027import dev.failsafe.event.ExecutionAttemptedEvent;
028
029/**
030 * Implementation of the {@link ConcurrentModificationMiddleware}. Uses {@link RetryPolicy} to retry upon {@link ConcurrentModificationException}.
031 * In case of a retry the request will an update request will be modified to include the
032 * {@link ConcurrentModificationException#getCurrentVersion() current version} reported by the error response.
033 */
034public class ConcurrentModificationMiddlewareImpl implements ConcurrentModificationMiddleware {
035    static final String loggerName = ClientBuilder.COMMERCETOOLS + ".retry.concurrent_modification";
036    private static final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(loggerName);
037    private static final Logger classLogger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ConcurrentModificationMiddleware.class);
038
039    public static final String VERSION = "version";
040    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY = 60000;
041    public static final int DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY = 200;
042
043    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
044    private final FailsafeExecutor<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> executor;
045
046    public ConcurrentModificationMiddlewareImpl() {
047        this(1, DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, new ObjectMapper());
048    }
049
050    public ConcurrentModificationMiddlewareImpl(final int maxRetries) {
051        this(maxRetries, DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY, new ObjectMapper());
052    }
053
054    public ConcurrentModificationMiddlewareImpl(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
055        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, new ObjectMapper());
056    }
057
058    public ConcurrentModificationMiddlewareImpl(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
059            ObjectMapper mapper) {
060        this.mapper = mapper;
061        RetryPolicy<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> retryPolicy = RetryPolicy.<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> builder()
062                .withBackoff(delay, maxDelay, ChronoUnit.MILLIS)
063                .withJitter(0.25)
064                .withMaxRetries(maxRetries)
065                .onRetry(this::logEventFailure)
066                .handle(ConcurrentModificationException.class)
067                .build();
068        this.executor = Failsafe.with(retryPolicy);
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(ApiHttpRequest request,
073            Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
074
075        Function<Throwable, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> fn = (throwable) -> {
076            if (throwable instanceof ConcurrentModificationException) {
077                final Long newVersion = ((ConcurrentModificationException) throwable).getCurrentVersion();
078                final JsonNode jsonNode;
079                if (newVersion != null && request.getMethod() == ApiHttpMethod.POST) {
080                    try {
081                        jsonNode = mapper.readTree(request.getBody());
082                        if (jsonNode instanceof ObjectNode && jsonNode.has(VERSION)) {
083                            ((ObjectNode) jsonNode).replace(VERSION, new LongNode(newVersion));
084                            return next.apply(request.withBody(jsonNode.toString()));
085                        }
086                    }
087                    catch (IOException ignored) {
088                    }
089                }
090            }
091
092            CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> f = new CompletableFuture<>();
093            f.completeExceptionally(throwable);
094            return f;
095        };
096
097        return executor.getStageAsync((context) -> {
098            if (context.isFirstAttempt()) {
099                return next.apply(request);
100            }
101            return fn.apply(context.getLastException());
102        });
103    }
104
105    private void logEventFailure(ExecutionAttemptedEvent<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> event) {
106        final int attempt = event.getAttemptCount();
107
108        logger.info(() -> "ConcurrentModification Retry #" + attempt);
109        logger.trace(() -> {
110            final Throwable failure = event.getLastException();
111            if (failure instanceof ApiHttpException) {
112                final ApiHttpException httpException = (ApiHttpException) failure;
113                final ApiHttpRequest request = httpException.getRequest();
114                final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response = httpException.getResponse();
115                if (request != null) {
116                    return requestLog(attempt, request, response);
117                }
118            }
119            return event.toString();
120        });
121    }
122
123    private String requestLog(final int attempt, ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<?> response) {
124        String output;
125        final String httpMethodAndUrl = request.getMethod().name() + " " + request.getUrl().toString();
126        if (request.getBody() != null) {
127            final String unformattedBody = request.getSecuredBody();
128            final boolean isJsonRequest = request.getHeaders()
129                    .getHeaders(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)
130                    .stream()
131                    .findFirst()
132                    .map(ct -> ct.getValue().toLowerCase().contains("json"))
133                    .orElse(true);
134            if (isJsonRequest) {
135                String prettyPrint;
136                try {
137                    prettyPrint = JsonUtils.prettyPrint(unformattedBody);
138                }
139                catch (final JsonException e) {
140                    classLogger.warn("pretty print failed", e);
141                    prettyPrint = unformattedBody;
142                }
143                output = "ConcurrentModification Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl
144                        + "\nformatted: " + prettyPrint;
145            }
146            else {
147                output = "ConcurrentModification Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + request.getMethod().name()
148                        + " " + request.getUrl() + " " + unformattedBody;
149            }
150        }
151        else {
152            output = "ConcurrentModification Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl
153                    + " <no body>";
154        }
155        if (response != null) {
156            output += "\nFailure response: " + response.getStatusCode() + "\n" + response + "\n"
157                    + Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody())
158                            .map(body -> JsonUtils.prettyPrint(response.getBodyAsString().orElse("")))
159                            .orElse("<no body>");
160        }
161        return output;
162    }
163}
